document.full_text: it was child's play again for novak djokovic on kid's day at the french open on wednesday as the dominant serb booked a third round slot when romanian victor hanescu retired hurt while trailing 6-4 6-1 2-3.
document.title: child's play for djokovic and federer at roland garros
lines_and_colors: it was child's play again for novak djokovic on kid's day at the french open on wednesday as the dominant serb booked a third round slot when romanian victor hanescu retired hurt while trailing 6-4 6-1 2-3.
